error.message: Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Call to deprecated constant NODE_NOT_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::NOT_PUBLISHED instead.
Call to deprecated constant NODE_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::PUBLISHED instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\LinkGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\path_file\PathFileEntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\path_file\PathFileEntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Please use toUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\path_file\PathFileEntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to path_file.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
